name: Skeleton Words8 Multiple Choice Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: BBBL (a small globule of air or a gas in a liquid or a solid)
ND (a Republic in south Asia)
RSTRNT (a commercial establishment where meals are prepared and served to customers)
Q (a line of people or vehicles waiting for something)
SFR (an overland journey or hunting expedition especially in Africa)
BVS (easy to see or understand)
SMS (a language also called Thai)
DNC (a group of spectators at a concert or play)
BZR (a street of small stalls especially in the Orient)
DCV (to mislead)
NN (a plant cultivated for its rounded edible bulb)
DCS (the district under the jurisdiction of a bishop)
KRK (entertainment of Japanese origin in which people sing songs over pre-recorded backing tape)
CZM (skin inflammation accompanied by intense itching)
MRTS (a Republic in the Indian Ocean)
NCGNT (under an assumed name or appearance or in disguise)
SL (Asian capital)
questions.explanation:
Seoul & seoul.

	Capital of South Korea.

questions.text: GN (Tropical American arboreal herbivorous lizard)
QVR (a case for arrows)
RNST (serious in mind or intention)
LYSSS (the Latin name of Odysseus)
TP (Asian capital)
questions.explanation:
Taipei & taipei.

	The largest and capital city of Taiwan.

questions.text: DRM (a museum display as of an animal or of a specimen in its natural setting)
SCHDNFRD (delight in another person's misfortune)
NPHL (a lover or connoisseur of wines)
questions.explanation:
Oenophile & enophile.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
